data.title: Bernard split, a look at her changing name through the years
data.meta_description: The star has dropped her well-known surnames following her recent heartbreak and will now be known as 'Cheryl'
data.text:
Cheryl has dropped her recent married name Fernandez-Versini following her split from Jean-Bernard, as she now wishes to be known as 'Cheryl'.

But it follows a rollercoaster love life for the star, and she's had a few names that we'll all remember.

The X Factor beauty officially announced her split from husband Jean-Bernard just a few months ago, and now wishes to be referred to as 'Cheryl'.

The star has even booked her first public appearance under her mononymous moniker.

A source said: â€œCheryl wants to wipe the slate clean and start afresh with a new name, now the divorce is going through."

Here we take a look at her rocky love life, and her changing names:

Cheryl Fernandez-Versini

The star recently split from her husband Jean-Bernard, following a whirlwind marriage.

Read more : Cheryl drops the name Fernandez-Versini

After the pair met at Cannes Film Festival in 2014, they were barely apart before tying the knot just 12 weeks later in Mustique - with Cheryl taking his name straight away.

One thought spread across the country - how will it go down with the X Factor narrator? But he mastered it perfectly.

Few could deny how happy pop starlet Cheryl looked on the arm of the dashing restaurateur - but within months the pair's relationship was in ruins.

Cheryl

There was a brief spell following her split from Ashley, when Cheryl attempted to drop her last name and move on from her marriage.

But having grown as a star under the name, fans struggled to drop it and re-adjust - with Cheryl only really cementing a new name after meeting Jean-Bernard.

Cheryl Cole

The star was left heartbroken following her split from football ace Ashley in 2013.

The pair appeared to be love's young dream after they met following Cheryl's success in Girls Aloud.

They were married from 2006 - 2010, before a heartbreaking divorce amid claims he had cheated on her.

She kept her married name for years after, before attempting to drop it on X Factor for all of a few weeks.

She struggled to make it stick, having grown as a star under the name previously, and kept it on before meeting Jean-Bernard.

Cheryl Tweedy

We all knew her as she shot into the limelight as Cheryl Tweedy.

The fresh-faced singer join singing contest Popstars: The Rivals under the name she grew up with, before meeting Ashley and dropping it for good.
